mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, G. W. Snyder to George Washington, 1798 October 1
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Snyder, G. W.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Snyder writes that some weeks ago he had sent Washington a letter with Robison's Proof of a Conspiracy--since then, he is more confirmed in opinion that groups called “Illuminati—German Union—Reading Societies—and in France by that of the Jacobine-Club” are operating for overthrow of this government--many of these groups are of French sympathies and begin by trying to destroy all religion--prays that God, who set Washington “as a Deliverer of, and Father of his Country” may keep him safe until this crisis passes. Autograph letter signed, 4 pages. Docketed by George Washington.
